title: BRIEF-India's Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Sept Qtr Consol Profit Rises
text:
BRIEF-India's Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Sept Qtr Consol Profit Rises

Stock Markets 38 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 20:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Sept Qtr Consol Profit Rises Oct 15 (Reuters) - Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL PROFIT 24.6 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 23.8 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL TOTAL INCOME 236.7 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 251.8 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO

BRIEF-India's Reliance Industrial Infrastructure Sept Qtr Consol Profit Rises
